MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH21 area of Musselburgh, affecting properties in Crookston Farm and surrounding area. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm due to fault on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:25 AM on Monday, 08 March 2021.
